mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectOrdErpTrnsmis Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ORD_NO , ORD_ERP_TRNSMIS_TP_CD , ERP_TRNSMIS_CD , ERP_TRNSMIS_DT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM ORD_ERP_TRNSMIS WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ORD_ERP_TRNSMIS_TP_CD = #{ordErpTrnsmisTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ERP_TRNSMIS_CD = #{erpTrnsmisCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
